function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Difficulty conveying comprehensive information that reflects uncertainty to the public","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public’s lack of understanding of professional knowledge about risks","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public seeking unproven information or rumors due to uncertainty","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concealment of information by governments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consensus in expert judgments","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interdisciplinary challenges in risk assessment","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate and inaccurate information disclosure from the government to the public","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in deciding what information to disclose to the public","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of government decision-making on risk governance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of equivocal expressions in risk communication","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specialized communication strategies for separate groups","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consider audience perceptions and concerns in risk communication","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate risk communication during an ongoing investigation of an unknown disease","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Silencing and punishing of ’rumormongers’ during the initial outbreak of an unknown disease","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective risk preparedness leading to shortage of goods, loose management, and disordered collaboration among agencies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctant information disclosure leading to public’s ignorance of self-protection","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Politics being the most important issue restricting the voice of the academic community","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to establish networks of working relationships among individuals, groups, and agencies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misleading information and panic buying of unproven medicines and protective equipment.","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding and perception of the outbreak leading to extreme behaviors.","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exaggerated scientific claims leading to misinformation and lack of perception of risk.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Miscommunication of covid-19 transmission characteristics leading to public misinformation","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to acknowledge diverse levels of risk tolerance and perception","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ambiguous information about outbreak handling by the government","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of rumors and conspiracy theories online","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in risk communication","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Government concealing information about the outbreak","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ambiguity in government communication","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of conspiracy theories and rumors","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of timely warning to the public about the outbreak","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Government decision making based on political interests and social stability rather than public health","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in government control measures due to balancing political, stability, and economic factors","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of scientific risk communication in decision making","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate risk interpretation in communication","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited government information dissemination","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bats as native host of covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission and infectious incubation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in basic reproduction number r0","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate risk communication regarding the 2019-2020 wuhan covid-19 outbreak","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in identifying the source of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 cases from wuhan","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information transparency during the initial outbreak","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective risk communication associated with covid-19","category":"Communication risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contaminated medical waste mixing with domestic waste","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of waste management as an urgent public service","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of environmental impact of the epidemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Excess of chlorine in water could generate harmful effects on people’s health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in domestic and medical waste","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temporary decrease in ghg emissions with no long-term impact","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
